column1: Goodwill was assigned to our More Personal Computing segment. The goodwill was primarily attributed to increased
synergies that are expected to be achieved from the integration of Activision Blizzard. Substantially all of the goodwill is
expected to be non-deductible for income tax purposes.

months ended December 31, 2023. The change of Activision Blizzard content from third-party to first-party is reflected
